lines.text:
[Looking at Samurai armor]
Wow. Ancient Japanese battle armor.
Yeah. My father is into the Japanese culture.
Oh yeah. I remember now. Your mother is Japanese.

[while being attacked by M. Bison]
You filthy bastard!

[after Guile throws dirt in Ken's face]
Hey! That's a dirty trick.
We don?t follow any rules in a street fight, kid.

[after Guile defeats Ryu]
We follow a code. We only fight when it's one on one.
Not gang up like you military meatheads!

[about to do his special move to M.Bison]
If you want a demonstration that bad, you got it. But, I have to warn you, you've bit off more than you can chew.

[while fighting with Ken]
No one in this cage has ever escaped these claws.
Yeah, well there's a first time for everything.

[knocks a biker off of his motorcycle and hands him a wad of money]
Here you go. Merry Christmas.
